notes: Double clicking the item casts it on self.
A hero cannot consume more than one Royal Jelly.
Can only target heroes and Meepo clones.
Cannot target illusions, creep-heroes and other clones. Illusions and Tempest Doubles copy the Royal Jelly buff, if the main hero has it. Wukong’s Command clones do not copy the Royal Jelly buff.
Illusions and Tempest Doubles copy the Royal Jelly buff, if the main hero has it.
Wukong’s Command clones do not copy the Royal Jelly buff.
abilities.description: Grants a target allied unit a permanent buff that provides +2.25 Health Regen and +1.25 Mana Regen.

additionalInformation: Royal Jelly may not drop if another consumable neutral item within the same tier dropped already.
name: Royal Jelly
